      • genKey

        public static short genKey()
        This method generates the key of the music from a select number of keys
        Returns:
        short This is the pitch value of the key of the music

      • selectNoteTune

        public static short selectNoteTune(short key,
                   short qual)
        This method generates a note from the major pentatonic of a certain key
        Parameters:
        key - This is the key of the melody
        qual - This value represents the quality of the key, either major or minor. Major is represented by 0 and minor by 3
        Returns:
        short A note from the major pentatonic within an octave of the key value

      • selectNoteBase

        public static short selectNoteBase(int build)
        This method generates the base note of a chord
        Parameters:
        build - A melody note that the chord on the base will accompany.
        Returns:
        short A base note of a chord that accompanies build

      • chordQuality

        public static int chordQuality(int b)
        This method generates the quality of a chord with a given base. 1 is major, 2 is minor, 3 is a 7th chord. Depends on the key.
        Parameters:
        b - This is the base of the chord
        Returns:
        int Determines quality of chord: 1-major, 2-minor, 3-7th

      • selectDuration

        public static double selectDuration(double bpm)
        This method creates a duration(in seconds) of a quarter note
        Parameters:
        bpm - The beats-per-minute of the song
        Returns:
        double the length in seconds of a quarter note

      • genRhythms

        public static double[] genRhythms(double quarterNote)
        This method creates an array of doubles that contains the duration of each note of the piece. It generates enough rhythms to fill 2 minutes. It also sets the number of notes in the piece (noteLength)
        Parameters:
        quarterNote - This is the length of 1 quarter beat
        Returns:
        double[] An array of doubles containing the rhythms of each note.

      • genChorus

        public static int[] genChorus(short chorusLength)
        This method generates the melody notes of the chorus of the piece.
        Parameters:
        chorusLength - The number of notes in the chorus
        Returns:
        int[] An array of melody notes
